subject: Football
Gun Control
lead_paragraph: Cleveland nose tackle Shaun Rogers, a three-time Pro Bowler, was arrested at Hopkins International Airport for having a loaded .45-caliber hand gun in his carry-on luggage, the Cleveland police said.
snippet: Cleveland nose tackle Shaun Rogers, a three-time Pro Bowler, was arrested at Hopkins International Airport for having a loaded .45-caliber hand gun in his carry-on luggage, the Cleveland police said.
